title: Even Fibonacci Sum
description:
Write a function `even_fibonacci_sum` that calculates the sum of all even numbers in the Fibonacci sequence up to and including n (where n is an integer). The sequence starts with 0 and 1. Note that both 0 and 1 are considered to be in the Fibonacci sequence.

#### Function Signature
```python
def even_fibonacci_sum(n: int) -> int:
```

#### Input
- `n` (int): A positive integer.

#### Output
- Returns the sum of all even numbers in the Fibonacci sequence up to and including n.
